ResearchProjectDef.label: Averland Colors
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the ability to make Empire military clothing, banners/standards, and shields in the black and yellow colors of the Empire state of Averland.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Hochland Colors
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the ability to make Empire military clothing, banners/standards, and shields in the green and red colors of the Empire state of Hochland.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Middenland Colors
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the ability to make Empire military clothing, banners/standards, and shields in the blue and white colors of the Empire state of Middenland.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Nordland Colors
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the ability to make Empire military clothing, banners/standards, and shields in the blue and yellow colors of the Empire state of Nordland.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Ostermark Colors
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the ability to make Empire military clothing, banners/standards, and shields in the red and yellow colors of the Empire state of Ostermark.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Ostland Colors
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the ability to make Empire military clothing, banners/standards, and shields in the black and white colors of the Empire state of Ostland.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Reik Colors
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the ability to make Empire military clothing, banners/standards, and shields in the red accented white (or fawn) colors of the Empire state of Reikland.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Stirland Colors
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the ability to make Empire military clothing, banners/standards, and shields in the green and yellow colors of the Empire state of Stirland.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Talabheim Colors
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the ability to make Empire military clothing, banners/standards, and shields in the red and white colors of the Empire state of Talabheim.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Wissenland Colors
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the ability to make Empire military clothing, banners/standards, and shields in the gray and white colors of the Empire state of Wissenland.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Furniture
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the ability to make Empire furniture.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Medicine
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the ability for Empire to make high quality medicine, much more effective than basic fungal or herbal medicine.\n\nCombining certain key ingredients can make the efficacy of natural medicines much more effictive.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Ranged Weaponry
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the ability to make basic Empire crossbows and huntsmans bows. Powerful weapons, with great range.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Walls & Structure
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows for the building of Empire walls. These are sturdier structures than most.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Doors
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows for the building of basic Empire doors.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Cooking
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows colonists to cook the foods of The Empire.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Gardening
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows colonists to grow plants specific to the Empire of man.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Brewing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows colonists to make mead from bee's honey.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Art
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows colonists to make Empire themed art statues.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Recreation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows colonists to make things intented for recreation.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Strong Doors
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows for the building of strong Empire doors. They're well built, and will stand up to much abuse. They even look nice.\n\nGiven the horrors lurking around the olde worlde, especially in The End Times, it makes sense for the folk of the Empire to have the strongest door that they possibly can.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Gates
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows for the building of Empire gates. Reasonably strong, made of wood and iron.\n\nThe people of the Empire require strong protection from greenskin and chaotic armies that frequently assault them. These gates and sturdy castle walls are often the first non-human step in that defense.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Food Preservation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows colonists of the Empire to preserve food.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Bee Keeping
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows colonists to to set up artificial bee hives, which bees will settle in, and then begin producing honey. Honey can be used to make food, as a delicious treat, or to make alcoholic mead for drinking.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Faith
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the ability to make idols of the gods at a sculpting spot. The idols can then be used by pawns of the appropriate faith to create relics from which they will learn additional faith powers.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Weaving
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows colonists to build a loom, and create rugs. Rugs beautify a room, and help control filth.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Black Powder
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows colonists to make black powder. Mineable saltpeter and sulfur can then be combined with wood for charcoal at a munitions bench, to be turned into black powder. Black powder is used to make rounds for black powder warmachines.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Apparel Repair
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the ability for Empire folk to repair apparel at an Empire tailor bench.\n\nThe olde world is tough on clothing and apparel. Being able to repair clothing is a must, as resources can become scarce.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Melee Hand Weapons
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the ability to make basic Empire melee hand weapons. Spears, swords, and halberds.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Apparel
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the ability to make Empire apparel. Shirts, pants, hats, and so on.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Castle Walls
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows for the building of Empire castle walls.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Strong Gates
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows for the building of strong Empire gates. Solid metal or stone gates that can stand up to some real abuse.\n\nKeeping the people alive, and sending back their greenskin and chaos foes is a priority for Empire leadership. Gates such as this allow the men and women of the Empire to feel safe when inside the castle or settlement. They also allow time for the organizing of a proper defense should a foe's army appear on the horizon.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Armor
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the ability to make basic Empire armor. Helmets, and body armor.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Improved Apparel
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the ability to make better Empire apparel. Shirts, pants, hats, and so on.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Light & Temperature
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the ability to make basic Empire light and temperature buildings. This includes ceiling lights, passive coolers, and braziers.\n\nNothing keeps the evils of the dark away like a good well lit area. The men and women of the Empire have embrace the light.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Firearms
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows for construction of basic Empire flint lock rifles and pistols.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Basic Magic Items
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows Empire wizards to craft basic magic items.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Melee Great Weaponry
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the ability to make basic Empire melee great weapons. Flails and greatswords.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced Castle Walls
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows for the building of Empire castle walls with arrow slits, so that the walls can be fired through.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Armor & Weapon Repair
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the ability for Empire folk to repair armor, shields, and weapons at a forge. Also firearms at an Empire blasing bench.\n\nThe constant threats again the Empire of man means that weapons and armor get much use. In between battles, it's important to get armor and weapons repaired, and back in great fighting shape.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Improved Melee Hand Weaponry
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the ability to make very fine Empire hand weaponry. Weapons that not only look impressive, but do a relatively impressive job as well.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Improved Armor
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the ability to make improved Empire armor. Armor that looks good, and protects well. Includes helmets, and body armor.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Improved Furniture
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the ability to make improved Empire furniture.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Warmachines
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows for the building of Empire warmachines. This basic level will allow cannons and mortars.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Improved Firearms
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows for construction of improved Empire rifles and pistols.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Intermediate Magic Items
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows Empire wizards to craft intermediate magic items.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Massive Gates
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows for the building of massively sized, and very strong Empire gates. They are solid metal and stone constructed gates, they look great, and they can stand up to much abuse.\n\nAs the End Times proceed, stronger gates will be required to keep the people of the Empire safe.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Improved Melee Great Weaponry
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the ability to make fine Empire melee great weapons. Flails and greatswords.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Massive Curtain Walls
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows for the building of massive defensive Empire curtain walls.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced Light & Heat
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the ability to make advanced Empire lighting and heat buildings. Better ceiling lights and hearths; as well as wall mounted lights.\n\nWealthy family homes in any Empire city have a hearth, and most respectable rooms will have appropriately nice ceiling and wall lights. Pushing back the darkness of the night is considered a sign of civilization, and even the most uncouth of Empire citizens won't attempt to refute that logic.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced Warmachines
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows for the building of advanced Empire warmachines. This advanced level will allow hellblasters and rocket batteries.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced Ballistics & Launchers
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows for the building of advanced Empire firearms. This advanced level will allow long rifles with rifled barrels, grenade launchers, and repeater guns.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced Apparel
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the ability to make fine Empire apparel. Shirts, pants, hats, and so on.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Defensive Towers
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows for the building of large defensive towers that will automatically shoot arrows at nearby foes.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced Magic Items
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows Empire wizards to craft advanced magic items.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Superior Armor
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the ability to make the best Empire armor. The most protective, and best looking armor. No officer would be caught dead in anything else.
